title: Program for Enhancing Mathematical Information Literacy Using Web-Based Inquiry Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Emphasizing information evaluation and utilization skills for solving math problems in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can determine the credibility of online mathematical information with over 80% accuracy using the ISIS-21 tool
Learners can independently perform a three-stage information analysis process (search-evaluation-synthesis) in a simulated environment
Learners can submit math problem-solving results with over 90% completion accuracy by applying information literacy in VR-based projects
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
